data.text: -I heard something online that you are a giant Spice Girls fan.

data.text: -Well, there's one named Emma, right?

data.text: -Yeah, and, so, growing up, I was super blond.

translation.text: -Yeah, và, vì vậy, lớn lên, tôi siêu tóc vàng.
